about_the_game:
Face the invading Dark Wisp

Play as the guardian Specter and his flying companion Mip as they travel deep into the depths to seal away the invading evil spirits known as the Dark Wisps, a group of ghostly apparitions who cause harm to the innocent creatures of the forest.

Key Features:

  • Explore an interconnected world as you fight your way against hordes of Ghostly Apparitions.
  • Switch between melee and ranged attacks as Specter and Mip. Slice your enemies as Specter & shoot enemies from a distance as Mip.
  • Get through tricky obstacles using Mip's Echolocation ability to reveal hidden platforms.
  • Unlock new magic abilities for both Specter and Mip. Blow enemies into the wind with the tornado ability. Summon spectral swords that aid you in combat.
  • Obtain key items and solve light puzzles.
  • Inspect items you collected in your inventory.
  • Face hordes of Ghostly enemies and bosses.
  • Full support for gamepad, & mouse + keyboard.
detailed_description:
Face the invading Dark Wisp

Play as the guardian Specter and his flying companion Mip as they travel deep into the depths to seal away the invading evil spirits known as the Dark Wisps, a group of ghostly apparitions who cause harm to the innocent creatures of the forest.

Key Features:

  • Explore an interconnected world as you fight your way against hordes of Ghostly Apparitions.
  • Switch between melee and ranged attacks as Specter and Mip. Slice your enemies as Specter & shoot enemies from a distance as Mip.
  • Get through tricky obstacles using Mip's Echolocation ability to reveal hidden platforms.
  • Unlock new magic abilities for both Specter and Mip. Blow enemies into the wind with the tornado ability. Summon spectral swords that aid you in combat.
  • Obtain key items and solve light puzzles.
  • Inspect items you collected in your inventory.
  • Face hordes of Ghostly enemies and bosses.
  • Full support for gamepad, & mouse + keyboard.
name: Echo Wisp Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or Intel, 3.3 GHz (AMD FX 8300, Intel i5 3000)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or Intel, 4 GHz (AMD Ryzen 5 3600, Intel i5 8600)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Save the once peaceful land in Echo Wisp. Explore an underground depths overrun by evil ghostly apparitions. Slash and shoot your enemies as two heroes each with their own unique abilities in this action adventure platformer.
